attributes.action: reject any calls to elevate Mr George Martin, the soon to be retired Speaker of The House of Commons, to the peerage or to bestow upon him any other honour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Michael Martin, the Speaker of the House of Commons has recently announced that after substantial and unprecedented pressure from fellow MPs and the public alike, he will be retiring from his appointment.

During his time in office he consistently proved that he was incapable of adequately carrying out the duties of that office.

Any attempt to bestow an honour or peerage upon this man should be firmly rejected by the Prime Minister.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Queen.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
